Name: Thomas Scott
About the game: The game takes place in the world of 'SweetLand'. The hero of the game needs to find answers and solve many puzzles. Traveling through a fascinating world and collecting stars for the opportunity to go to the next level! Features Rotation of the entire level Riddles, secrets and adventures Original bright world of the game Various puzzles with switches and levers Doors, keys, and physics
